description: An application made under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission DC/18/109819 for Approval of Reserved Matters for Blocks C (part 3/10/12 storeys), D1 (16-19 storeys), D2 (30 storeys) and E (4 storeys) to provide a total of 530 residential units (comprising 16 studio units, 238 one-bedroom units, 271 two-bedroom units and 5 three-bedroom units), 6,308mý (GEA) of co-living floorspace (comprising 119 co-living units and communal facilities (Use Class sui generis), 4,381mý (GEA) of retail/restaurant/cafe, floorspace (Use Class A1 and/or A3), 1,525mý (GEA) of co-working floorspace (Use Class B1), a cinema, (2,472mý GEA) and gym (1,606mý GEA) (Use Class D2), and associated hard and soft landscaping works, pursuant to condition 2, relating to layout, scale, appearance and landscaping for the comprehensive mixed use redevelopment of the outline approval DC/18/105218 (granted on 29 November 2018) under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 as a Minor Material Amendment in connection with the planning permission DC/06/62375 (granted on 8 May 2009) for the comprehensive mixed use redevelopment of the Lewisham Gateway Site, SE13 (land between Rennell Street and Lewisham Railway Station) for up to 100,000mý comprising retail (A1, A2, A3, A4 and A5), offices (B1), hotel (C1), residential (C3), education/health (D1) and leisure (D2) with parking and associated infrastructure, as well as open space and water features: in order to allow amendments to the design of the balcony and roof terrace balustrade proposed for Blocks C, D1 and D2
site_name: LEWISHAM GATEWAY, LEWISHAM HIGH STREET, LONDON, SE13
